Title: The Hermit
Descriptions: Sebastian: I just got word that there's a hermit somewhere down south who knows the whereabouts of an extremely valuable medicines cache which we could really use around here. Would you be willing to investigate the last known location of this hermit and see if the rumours are true? Last I heard he was camped up somewhere near Polana. I'll mark his last known location on your map - see if he's still there and what he has to say. Don't worry, this isn't a charity mission - you'll be well rewarded for your efforts.

Sebastian: I just got word that there's a hermit somewhere down south who knows the whereabouts of an extremely valuable medicines cache which we could really use around here. Would you be willing to investigate the last known location of this hermit and see if the rumours are true? Last I heard he was camped up somewhere near Polana. I'll mark his last known location on your map - see if he's still there and what he has to say. Don't worry, this isn't a charity mission - you'll be well rewarded for your efforts.

Sebastian: I heard you had some trouble with that mission. Thanks again for your help, we can always count on you to get the job done. These medical supplies will go a long way towards keeping Sanctuary going strong. Here, take this - you earned it.
